reviewText: My only problem is that Amazon only has it on VHS, does anybody even have a VHS player anymore ? Lol anyway, great movie! Loved every minute of it !
such an offbeat movie with some truly hilarious scenes, you don't see every step coming in this one.

I am a 47 year old white woman that has just fallen in love with a black man. I loved that movie and would love to see him in more westerns. He's the perfect cowboy. I'm madly in love. Why this moveie didn't make it big is beyond me. I loved it, he's beautiful!!!
